scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n shared,server,client -c magenta,blue,green "yarn workspace @ai-web3-influencer/shared dev" "yarn workspace server dev" "yarn workspace client dev"
scripts.test: yarn workspace contracts test && yarn workspace server test
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf **/node_modules && rimraf **/dist && rimraf contracts/artifacts contracts/cache server/.tsbuildinfo client/.vite
